ğŸ¦ Movies / TV shows â€‹

This website shows you how to watch and download movies and TV shows for free. â€‹

Best Websites For Movie Streaming: â€‹

1. watch.lonlil â­ â€‹

A great website to watch 4K movies and TV shows.

2. FMovies â­ â€‹

Very popular brand where you can watch movies online in high definition for no cost, on your phone, tablet, or pc.

3. 123Chill â­ â€‹

The best place to watch a superb assortment of movies and television shows with the most recent material continuously updated.

4. FlixHQ â­ â€‹

Safest free movie site in 2023 to instantly view movies and television shows online.

5. movie-web â­ â€‹

The ideal destination for your favorite movies and TV series. The algorithm intelligently picks the finest stream throughout the web.

6. MyFlixer | Mirrors: 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 â€‹

A fantastic selection of free high-definition movies and series. New content and episodes are uploaded on an hourly basis.

7. Seez â€‹

Keep track of, explore, and stream all of your movies and TV shows. It's a very well-designed site.

8. SFlix â­ â€‹

One of the best free sites for binge-watching movies online in HD quality without any registration or money.

9. Smashystream â€‹

You can watch a lot of movies here in HD quality. An amazing design.

10. Soap2day / 2 â€‹

Great alternatives since the fall of the original soapgate.cc. Offering a tonne of free movies.

11. HiMovies â€‹

You can find a large range of new films and series on the website, most of them are in HD quality.

12. SusFlix â€‹

An excellent movie / TV streaming website that has an iOS and Android app. You do have to sign up though.

Best Sites For Downloading Movies: â€‹

1. 4K Movies â­ â€‹

Amazing assortment of outstanding quality movies that are offered for super quick direct download through the Mega file service.

2. BollyMaza â€‹

Download full movies in high-bitrate, high-resolution formats without having to register for free in both English and Hindi dub. The only problem is that the design of the website isn't good.

Best Movie Apps For Android: â€‹

1. NovaTV | Remove the in-app ads â€‹

One of the first free movies app I have used! It has high-quality movies, it has TV shows and it's free. It does have ads but your adblocker should block them.

2. FilmPlus â­ | Remove the in app ads â€‹

I would recommend this app to anyone I know! It's free, easy to use, has TV shows and has a lot of high-quality movies and TV shows. FilmPlus does have ads so you can use a system-wide adblocker to block them, or you could download a mod to remove them, which is listed above.

3. BeeTV | Remove the in-app ads â€‹

BeeTV is also very good. It's free, has a lot of high-quality movies and TV shows and it's easy to use. BeeTV does have ads so you can use a system-wide adblocker to block them, or you could download a mod to remove them, which is listed above.

4. OnStream â­ | Remove the in-app ads â€‹

OnStream has an extremely modern and gorgeous UI. It is also very fast at loading and streaming movies with little to no buffering. Onstream does have ads so you can use a system-wide adblocker to block them, or you could download a mod to remove them, which is listed next to the name.

5. HDO Box â­ | Remove the in-app ads â€‹

Similar to OnStream. It has a modern and simple design. Very fast with little buffering. Note: This app has ads so either use a system-wide adblocker or download a mod for it, which is listed above.

6. OFOO â€‹

A great movie streaming app for Android. The design is great, the streaming is fast and the app has no ads. Just doesn't have an option to download the movie / TV show you want. I also don't like that the source code is only available to people who pay for it.

7. Flixclusive â€‹

Another great movie streaming app, it has a simple and modern design with no ads. It is open-source and has fast streaming speeds.

Note:

As I'm writing this the download link in the GitHub readme isn't working, so go here for the official working download link on GitHub.

Best Movie Apps For iOS / iPadOS â€‹

There are not a lot of good free movie apps for iOS / iPadOS so I recommend you just use a website listed above with an adblocker.
